parameters.name: PathSegments
parameters.description: Array of ISketchSegment s, IReferenceCurve s, and/or IEdge s

title: IPrimaryMemberPathSegmentFeatureData.SetPathSegments
description: Gets the path segments, curves, and edges to create the structure system member.

parameters.name: PathSegments
parameters.description: Array of ISketchSegment s, IReferenceCurve s, and/or IEdge s

returns: True if path segments successfully set, false if not
remarks:
For .NET applications, you must marshal the PathSegments array to IDispatch object arrays before calling this method. See
IDispatch Object Arrays as Input in .NET
.
